long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Quickly navigate to pages in new tabs or the current tab within HireHop while browsing other websites.

This extension also tells you if you are still logged in and enables you to log out, even if you have no HireHop pages open.  This Chrome extension also works on the free version of HireHop Equipment Rental Software.

How To Install and Use:
It is very easy to use, just install the extensions, then pin the extension to the taskbar by clicking the puzzle icon on the top right of your browser and clicking the pin icon next to HireHop.  Once installed, whenever you click the new HireHop icon (should be an "HH") on the top right of the Chrome task bar, a menu will pop up giving you an option where to navigate to in HireHop.
At the bottom of the menu is an option to open the HireHop pages in new tabs or the active tab.
If you are not logged in, the log out options will be hidden from view.

This extension is available in Afrikaans, German, Greek, English, Spanish, Estonian, French, Hebrew, Italian, Japanese, Dutch, Norwegian, Portuguese, Slovak and Swedish.  It will automatically switch language depending on the language preferences you have set in Chrome.
